attributes.action: Listen to us the people not tell us
attributes.additional_details:
I am sick and tired of being told what to think and how to behave, we as people of this nation DO KNOW the difference between right and wrong, and we the people also expect our politicians to know the deference, but it is apparent to us all that in spite of pretensions of knowing this deference as they and there banker friends all come from an educated and previelged classes, they continue to rob and steel from us the poor hard-working electorate, and spoken down to in a condescending manner from high above..
IT MUST STOP AND STOP NOW.
